attributes.action: Ban Lorries from Overtaking on motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lorries cannot see adequately when overtaking on motorways.  Over the last year 3 people I know have been collided with and spin by lorries on M25 and M23. The Highways Agency says it is a daily event especially involving left-hand drive lorries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
